item.title: [ImaginaryCTF 2023 - reverse] Sheepish
item.description: ImaginaryCTF 2023 - Write-Up for the challenge Sheepish (Reverse) TL;DR: Obfuscated Python code using lambda-calculus. Description: Mary had a flagchecker, its fleece was white as snow. Introduction We are given a Python script, consisting in a single line of ~26k characters, with lots of lambda-functions. The full script is available here , see the beginning and the end of the file below. print((((lambda _____________:((lambda ___:_____________(lambda _______:___(___)(_______)))(lambda ___:_____________(lambda _______:___(___)(_______)))))(lambda _____________:lambda ___________:lambda ______:(lambda ____:(lambda _:_(lambda __________:lambda _____:__________))(____))(___________)(lambda _:(lambda __________:lambda _____:__________))(lambda _:(lambda __________:lambda _____:__________(_____)(lambda __________:lambda _____:_____))((lambda __________:lambda _____:(lambda __________:lambda _____:__________(_____)(lambda __________:lambda _____:_____))((lambda __________:lambda _____:(lambda __________:__________(lambda _:(lambda __________:lambda _____:_____))(lambda __________:lambda _____:__________)) [.
